Heartbeat.help: This sends a message to the server to keep alive your connection when idle.

ImageServerBaseURL.help: This is the URL that contains the server list.

PWMannager.help: Setting this to On will make the Password Manager auto start when you start OpenRPG

ColorTree.help: This option specifies whether or not your want your Gametree and Player List colored the same as your chat.

PackagesType.help: The type of package you want to DL, this is usualy set progmaticly

PackagesName.help: The name of the package you want to DL, this is usualy set progmaticly

AutoUpdate.help: Wether or not the updater automaticly downloads the files

FastStart.help: Weather the Patcher will automaticly exit after it updates or if there are no updates to get

player.help: This is your name as it appears in chat.

Show_Images_In_Chat.help: Allows Images to be displaied in the chat window.

striphtml.help: Set this to 1 to have HTML tags stripped from the chat window.

Chat_Time_Indexing.help: Allows messages to be prepended with their arrival time using either of two preset formats or a formated timestring (see time.strftime() in python docs)

gwtext.help: This is attached prior to your group whispers(ie /gw Hello group would send '(GW): Hello group')

buffersize.help: This is the amount of backscroll allowed.

PurgeAtBuffersizeTimesLines.help:
This option tells the program when to purge old history.
When the buffer exceeds this number times the buffersize
all history is removed and you are just left with a history 
as large as the number you set your buffersize to.

AutoPurgeAfterSave.help: When saving your log, this option will either automaticaly purge the buffer or not.

TypingStatusAlias.help: This is the text displayed in the Player list under status while you are typing.

IdleStatusAlias.help: This is the text displayed in the Player list under status while you are not typing.

ShowIDInChat.help: Set this to have the Player Id show up next to the player name in chat.

TimeStampGameLog.help: Set this to 1 to have time stamps added to the log.

GameLogPrefix.help: This text is the files name minus the extention of your log file.

tabbedwhispers.help: Set this to 1 to receive whispered messages in separate chat tabs .

GMWhisperTab.help: Creates a tab for all GM whispers, tabbedwhispers being on is required for this too work

GroupWhisperTab.help: Creates a tab for all Group whispers, tabbedwhispers being on is required for this too work

F1.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

F2.help: What you enter here will be sent to chat when this function key is pressed.

bgcolor.help: This is the background color of the chat window.

textcolor.help: This is the default color used when text is printed into the chat window.

mytextcolor.help: This is the color of your text in the chat window.

syscolor.help: This is the color of system messages printed in the chat window.

infocolor.help: This is the color of informational messages printed in the chat window.

emotecolor.help: This is the color of your emotes in the chat window.

whispercolor.help: This is the color of whisper messages in the chat window.

defaultfont.help: Set this to a preferred font to use at startup.

defaultfontsize.help: Set this to a preferred fontsize to use at startup.

ColorizeRoles.help: Colorizes roles in the player list.

GMRoleColor.help: Set the color for the GM Role

PlayerRoleColor.help: Set the color for the Player Role

LurkerRoleColor.help: Set the color for the Lurker Role

AlwaysShowMapScale.help: Setting this to 1 will keep the map scale displayed in the upper left corner of the map.

LoadGameTreeFeatures.help: Setting this to 1 will load the gametree features next time you run OpenRPG.

treedclick.help: This sets the action performed on a node when you double click it in the game tree.

SaveGameTreeOnExit.help: Set this to 1 if you want your game tree to automaticaly be saved when you log out.

gametree.help: This is the path on your computer pointing to the xml file\n for your tree.

RoomColor_Lobby.help: Sets the color used to display the 'Lobby' in the Room List in the Gameserver window

RoomColor_Empty.help: Sets the color used to display empty rooms in the Room List in the Gameserver window

RoomColor_Locked.help: Sets the color used to display password protected rooms in the Room List in the Gameserver window

RoomColor_Active.help: Sets the color used to display non-passworded non-empty rooms in the Room List in the Gameserver window
